title: Is it necessary to steal names?
body:
I just watched the new Runes on PBE and there are so many names which are used in Dota. Does Riot have to do this? It doesn't feel right.

There are (for example):
Coup de Grace
Perseverance
Aftershock
Bounty Hunter
etc.

replies.body: God forbid they use a vowel in anything because I'm sure dota uses those and league shouldnt be allowed to "steal" those

What? commonly used names throughout many games are now being considered stolen? Ohhhh nooo

Get over youself.


Bounty hunter has been in league, so has perserverance.
